wobani.core

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Scene

  • public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    Scene contains all the GameObjectContainer, the RenderableContainer, unique lists of Components and parameters like the main Camera or the main DirectionalLight.
